Constructor that Instantiates the Select paramters.

tableMap - Map. The tables of the currently used database.

Method Detail

results

public java.util.List results(java.lang.Object arg)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Returns the results of the query. This is called after the constructor.

Parameters:
arg - Object. A table (List or, a file reader object. This is the table to sececute the query against.
Returns:
List. The List of rows (map objects) that satisfied the select clause.
Throws:
Exception. - Throws exceptions if the arg is not a List or a filereader, also throws IO exceptions if file doesn't exist or contains bad JSON.
java.lang.Exception
